title: Short-Intensive Team Training Course Based on Medical Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and patient safety concepts
context.additional_context: Team-based learning environments emphasizing simulation experiences and debriefing using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners perform team decision-making processes in high-risk disease simulations with 80% accuracy.
Through simulation-based debriefing, learners derive at least three strategies to improve team collaboration.
Using digital simulation tools, learners apply patient safety management procedures with a 90% completion rate.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
